==Lyrics==
===Chinese and English===
{| class="wikitable"
! Chinese Transcript !! Pinyin !! Official English Translation
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=邃宇兮 黑翳逐}} || ''Suìyǔ xī hēiyì zhú'' || (Long ago) In the field of stars, expelling the dark shadows
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=山野兮 窘步}} || ''Shānyě xī jiǒng bù'' || (Now) Lost in the mountains and wilderness, with no way to go
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=出！/ 幽宫兮 余既伏}} || ''Chū! / Yōugōng xī yú jì fú'' || Show yourself! / O deep, cold palace, the place of my sins
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=君常违兮 国隳芜 / 乌有兮 归处}} || ''Jūn cháng wéi xī guóhuī wú / Wūyǒu xī guīchù'' || Since you left, this country has fallen into a terrible state / Already long lost and forgotten, as for my home
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=蓄雠怨增欷 / 零落兮 困洿渎}} || ''Xù chóuyuàn zēng xī / Língluò xī kùn wūdú'' || Hatred, sorrow, and grief accumulate day after day / (Fate) Lonely and wandering, trapped in such a harsh place
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=惶惶兮 索陵迟恶途 / 奈何乎！}} || ''Huánghuáng xī suǒ língchí ètú / Nàihé hū!'' || Panicking and not knowing where to go, I embark on the treacherous journey ahead / What can I do!
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=归兮！}} || ''Guī xī!'' || It's time to return!
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=巉石峦岳毂转乎}} || ''Chánshí luányuè gǔzhuǎn hū'' || The steep rocks and mountains withstood the test of time
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=万川湍流吞穹庐}} || ''Wànchuān tuānliú tūn qiónglú'' || Thousands of rivers rush rapidly, seemingly swallowing the sky
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=山崩岩崒}} || ''Shānbēng yánzú'' || (But even if) Mountains fall and the earth tremors
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=愆辜安除？/ 愆辜安除？}} || ''Qiāngū ān chú? / Qiāngū ān chú?'' || How can the evil (which caused all this) be eradicated?
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=零落兮 困洿渎}} || ''Língluò xī kùn wūdú'' || (Fate) Lonely and wandering, trapped in such a harsh place
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=浇季兮 穷路}} || ''Jiāojì xī qióng lù'' || There is no way out of this miserable generation
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=林峻茂兮 掩殊途}} || ''Lín jùnmào xī yǎn shūtú'' || The mountains are precipitous and lush, hiding the path that diverged (between you and me)
|-
|{{Lang|mini=1|zh=审行迷延伫远兮 山穹覆}} || ''Shěn xíngmí yánzhù yuǎn xī shānqióng fù'' || Recounting how I had lost my way and wandered away from you, engulfed by the shadow of a mountain ridge
|}
